# segments

**Instance Property**

The time mappings from the track’s media samples to its timeline.

## Declaration

```swift
var segments: [AVAssetTrackSegment] { get }
```

## Accessing track segments

- **segment(forTrackTime:)**: Returns a segment whose target time range contains, or is closest to, the specified track time.

items.description: Returns a segment whose target time range contains, or is closest to, the specified track time.
items.name: segment(forTrackTime:)
